subject: The Friday Unwind: Your week in one smooth scroll
description_text:
Catch up on what’s happened this week — no stress, just the highlights.

View in browser (https://d56STN04.na1.hubspotlinks.com/Ctc/UD+113/d56STN04/MVqLBxC-wlfM5b08YvtY_fW1-ywb15G-b6yN4HzmfH5n4LbW7Y9pgv6lZ3lkW3mjrgX6jLZlCW4Q6FCf2QV3jRM74ZDxKG9Y6W5bN3X02Q1gyzW8Wm51z8sM7Q0W6jLgFv2CJSKXW5hCRs14SdrL5W6gV-HR2zJTDfW83CV-33Wm-rpW3dGHFH809zS1W6fdcf97y2Th_W2BmCpr8VXFKXW2ZHlm_6VyLYPW53rKhx82zkL1Vh7rRF1g0V30W1FJpY27D6H3LM6VbfrYBlqzW1kL_0x3zkk-YW6zwgBy92zg6NW5qxtfR2j7cK4W5fBk2r6JYFQPW6slcLs6d427WN8fY8M6t-wcfVxFbWT8tJ_6jN32hpGph1DpkW2yXWB91yGw9QW97q-Mb65jrxBV7yDVG1rwt76W77xbHS85q6nmW64-TbB8_YpwzV5cqvC4h-WZ3W8cBRgw7ZN02VN5pwbVxp65hgW1JKfGC1sQwKnW6kSfrB9kPDJLW69JWTg3Tnb8HW2T1FJp4VKx8pW3kJRZ78kNzJQW17GshQ8GG8NcW5B0-QN8Bj13BW5PXNw373hLxTN1CqwZTMM0RNf5YQbDv04 )

Hey Atto,

As the holiday season ramps up, here's your quick roundup of some strategic insights from Athos Commerce before you log off for the week.

This week is all about sharpening your edge for the new year: We cover how to Master Your Data to stay ahead of the omnichannel curve, share top-performer success models in our 'From Dust to Data' webinar, and dive into the evolving relationship between humans and machines in Grow 25: Volume 4. We also take a look at our Officeworks case study, showing how smarter API implementation delivers real revenue growth.

Catch you next Friday,

– The Athos Commerce Team

Featured This Week

? Blog | How to Master Your Data and Outpace the Omnichannel Shift (https://d56STN04.na1.hubspotlinks.com/Ctc/UD+113/d56STN04/MVqLBxC-wlfM5b08YvtY_fW1-ywb15G-b6yN4Hzmdb5n4LbW50kH_H6lZ3nLVQFqqD8KC16BW2ZpWSF2fFqKqW38Sngp1q9bCmW7v5M1d67YvSSW6YnxtZ8-3cnBW3Fd07-5vQMc0VJdwkq4mJ0C6W2-c1ps3PtY9bW160XLn6nNPfsF6Jvz9N9xWMW8cnhnV4_CprvW5b0r-l4ZNBVBW80rCsM8DFHzLW65Yj5v8BZR41W3_FjjQ3GgftpVtGG284-cd3sW33vRsq8Y4Y-NW6fs-4-72nnCwW8Lcgr13GPS_HV95YqW870N3fW2gvnSC6M_WnGW8cnkQb1YHHT3N7NK6pfH_hdCN5f1jF23lzBJW2m92Fp8ZZXL3W79NcJ51dfHJ8W6jjBs95-hlnSW4LGt9K6XqKwVW1R-nkd5P-qYkW6w12TN6n9C2xW1D5yxJ3z3-HTW3Q0yY76lMY2rf8XpY2404 )

The market demands that commerce leaders move with precision. When Michael Longauer of Athos Commerce recently spoke at the IMRG Weekly Data Show, the discussion centered on one non-negotiable reality: success in the age of social commerce and GenAI depends on mastering the fundamentals.



On-demand Webinar | From Dust to Data: Vacuuming Up Insights from Ecommerce’s Top Performers (https://d56STN04.na1.hubspotlinks.com/Ctc/UD+113/d56STN04/MVqLBxC-wlfM5b08YvtY_fW1-ywb15G-b6yN4Hzmgg3pyd0W95jsWP6lZ3nbN7J042Cgm1MNW44M-mw4YqYZ_W3DNhFd7WqMVDW7zTPBP1RJYHlMrlmB89JdP3W6tPwC77YfsgPW7Ghd-j5P9Zc9V-GY9H8Qjp6PW2dQ88p8km5-dW3N1lcn8msp0yW5syyr441QCPKW6wGs7y8hsP-HW6S1Cym3pgcsVV8v3S35bkBrPW2kV2Pq8hbrh2W8mC2YS35f2YYW1_YWJV8py_TpW6kz5kD35TRpwW3QHs1J7DGz-2W8MFwTf1qzpWXV7d7rY7rTKlJVmDv0X3qDPMLW71ZPdY8RYDPLVxBCnw6W-vf8W8z1FKp4KZ0rpW8BSynK5G23kLW8G5Fjf5nkD0ZW5Yy_zG7_6mq2W4JhXN13CklKRW7JT3bX5w6YTnf4F8Jsx04 )

GENE, Athos Commerce and Akoova are bringing to life the findings of the eCommerce Insights & Strategies Report - a deep analysis of how ecommerce leaders are navigating growth, technology, and performance.

On-demand Webinar | From Discovery to Conversion: Play-by-Play Insights from Kick Game & Ecommerce Experts (https://d56STN04.na1.hubspotlinks.com/Ctc/UD+113/d56STN04/MVqLBxC-wlfM5b08YvtY_fW1-ywb15G-b6yN4Hzmdb5n4LbW50kH_H6lZ3lVW4NWj8b47V_FxW8KRgt4585WmnW65tXcM6zvtZmN8fpKxg65SVGN99-lDsGYdjCVbshgC4hMBWrW7f9nyq98Q1cZW2y1rF23574VzW7X0bTY1HGYppW64yBQJ93XV0MW4W3CXD5Kw8TYVxFxyv7CtYq0W40jyfn1LxB13W1fgm_24ym9K3W7ZZyy31QyQH5W1MQyH378Fj8HW2nxNt847DrlhW3ZwbL_1mhjFtW8hqCwY3xT-4mW16vDM63zPCZsW2hwyxh3Dk1lcW2dWHFG80ZMCMW5-h0622QXNvsW4GJ_sN6ccSpZW4C3hRV5L-hBfW1q3FjY6J10ClW2d0sTY2mdKjkW8q3f694rfn0cW90xqj35Kg22vN2Kzp-hFlpBCN8LwNB4s7WSbW65vqTd95RCCXf6j2Ym604 )

Join Kick Game - the go-to destination for trainers and streetwear - and a panel of ecommerce experts as they share the exact moves they’re making to turn browsers into buyers right now.

Ebook | Grow 25: Volume 4 (https://d56STN04.na1.hubspotlinks.com/Ctc/UD+113/d56STN04/MVqLBxC-wlfM5b08YvtY_fW1-ywb15G-b6yN4HzmfH3pyd0W7Y8-PT6lZ3p0W1-tXrn79d1XWW4MwvBq4YJRWrW64bs3M3lSZY5W30sPjS25g8BjW53F_jh6PRNc9W1Xcxxv6vKR-YW4tX9pL3KVL-xW43mcWc7Tlt9TW5phtYG5mDvNfW5wN1hl22pLzFW4xHcbJ18BlkWW4_11fH5fDQNsVg3kNS61JmFqW1CPjph4VgQVsW4jk3-k5nk6MxN3gwHSX-9twBW6SWJ1M6JwDxTW3FshDc7_Qlc1V_d9jM57XnFZN73vMHXSz3FYVmKH-p7hN_WhW3MDdsK8v-JdMV1GTc45qZpVcW5t4J-p3HkX5LW7smcC12D9D8KW3xS6tW2m4Mfyf12wRHW04 )

Read insights from industry experts to understand the evolving relationship between humans, machines, and markets and what it means for the future of work and commerce.

Blog | Why TikTok Shop Is the New Front Door to Your Store (https://d56STN04.na1.hubspotlinks.com/Ctc/UD+113/d56STN04/MVqLBxC-wlfM5b08YvtY_fW1-ywb15G-b6yN4Hzmgg3pyd0W95jsWP6lZ3n2W5yLdCq29-f01W19_YCW8R6rhRW39-c_l6wQPyRW5Cn1Pm7dp_PHW2qw1XY2Glz3nW7RTmKK7D8DVmW2drjLj6xyl45W2kPJDk8bTLZSW8kHZS69gfFN-N8n_h7CjQS7KW3Vy45x6SpvC-W8t1Z316MrcZWW1SQRkq23MZlNVrxWXp3dkNqSW5jwNcS6m4Rb5W4VMhVx3_wWd1W2yQKxv7RnV1sN3C8m53GxlrtW3m54257nhyrmW99KR3K3PhLgmW4SmN526kyBKfVLqyDb3-HH21V3pzMK2bfFBpN4FTWtG-VQCzW9dWMpy1r8jGYW7MW06b2gFFFqN28stP0kkRVTW21SnwG3_FvpJW51s-lq1y5v1TN3WwzN0t-cfZf7xcgDP04 )

Discover how TikTok Shop drives discovery, conversion, and retention, becoming the essential front door for modern ecommerce brands.

Case Study | Officeworks (https://d56STN04.na1.hubspotlinks.com/Ctc/UD+113/d56STN04/MVqLBxC-wlfM5b08YvtY_fW1-ywb15G-b6yN4HzmfH3pyd0W7Y8-PT6lZ3lDVFzs2T19S8VwVbhMqn7rtRWjW55Xsxn6cLrW8W8XYcK46H5vJnW46Xl2L22nnvCW9lQdww3CvRj0W8c_FVX2LYM4nW4pkfkh6hb85NN4z4Vhfpv0BNVvdSx81q_4sRW7N--7x4PQ1MmW2dzGfV69n-FhW4-k-s26PdQ2RW3D5SLz4TJV-wW7q7NK36d262PW87JcFV7bR8g-N6RyMNqs1r_tW7yKKnS1PXm5BVHFFnR8FsDmxW997R0f855QwLW8MB0bM5qxH_RW9jCxTJ3P4ykGW7YC94Y78dsyYW42-Zgs1_grJrW3k-GLR8t1-ZVW4397gD3H2s44f2BsY2x04 )
